name.baseName: Scrap Aluminum Processing ; New Aluminum Scrap ; Old Aluminum Scrap
废铝加工 ; 新铝废料 ; 旧铝废料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Recycled aluminum from this process is used in various industries where secondary aluminum is acceptable, such as automotive, packaging, construction, and consumer electronics. The material can serve as an input for the production of aluminum alloys, casting, and extrusion products. Recycled aluminum is particularly valued for its lower environmental impact compared to primary aluminum production.
该工艺回收的铝材可在接受二手铝材的各种行业中使用，例如汽车、包装、建筑和消费电子产品行业。此材料可以用作铝合金、铸造和挤压产品生产的输入材料。相比于原生铝生产，回收铝因其较低的环境影响而备受重视。

technology.technologicalApplicability: Recycled aluminum from this process is used in various industries where secondary aluminum is acceptable, such as automotive, packaging, construction, and consumer electronics. The material can serve as an input for the production of aluminum alloys, casting, and extrusion products. Recycled aluminum is particularly valued for its lower environmental impact compared to primary aluminum production.
该工艺回收的铝材可在接受二手铝材的各种行业中使用，例如汽车、包装、建筑和消费电子产品行业。此材料可以用作铝合金、铸造和挤压产品生产的输入材料。相比于原生铝生产，回收铝因其较低的环境影响而备受重视。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: For reliable findings, the most recent and representative data were considered. Regional or country-specific data were used when provided in the GaBi© “professional and extension” database (SP 39) or in the literature. If location-specific data were not found, either comparable data for the country or global data were used. For consistency, data from the same source and year were used if available. Due to data availability, the study did not consider some inputs and background processes if they contributed less than 1% to the total input mass. In contrast, no established production process for secondary production exists as numerous different collectors, processors, and refiners apply various recycling methods (Green et al., 2007). The study used LCI data provided by the Aluminum Association from 2013 for secondary production (Aluminum Association, 2013; International Aluminium Institute, 2017a, International Aluminium Institute, 2017b). An exemplary case was examined, justifying the consideration of a specific dataset. In this study, two main changes were made: 1) a separate aluminium scrap collection process was added; 2) a higher salt input was assumed because many sources stated the large quantities of salt slag often remaining at the end of the recycling process (European Aluminium Association, 2018; Tsakiridis, 2012).

为了获得可靠的研究结果，我们考虑了最新的和有代表性的数据。如果 GaBi©"专业和推广 "数据库（SP 39）或文献中提供了特定地区或国家的数据，则使用这些数据。如果找不到特定地区的数据，则使用该国的可比数据或全球数据。为保持一致性，如果有相同来源和年份的数据，则使用相同来源和年份的数据。由于数据的可获得性，如果某些输入和背景过程对总输入质量的贡献小于 1%，则本研究不考虑这些输入和背景过程。对于原铝生产，本研究使用了国际铝业协会（IAI）提供的 2015 年最新 LCI 数据（国际铝业协会，2017b）。之所以使用 IAI 的数据，是因为 IAI 是一个考虑全球原铝生产的成熟机构，其数据已在铝业协会和欧洲铝业协会等研究中使用（铝业协会，2013 年；欧洲铝业协会，2018 年）。就标准化原铝生产的生命周期评估数据而言，不确定因素很少。一般来说，这些数据的组成可以完全解释和重建。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Luthin, A., Backes, J. G. & Traverso, M. A framework to identify environmental-economic trade-offs by combining life cycle assessment and life cycle costing – A case study of aluminium production. Journal of Cleaner Production 321, 128902 (2021).

Luthin, A., Backes, J. G. & Traverso, M. A framework to identify environmental-economic trade-offs by combining life cycle assessment and life cycle costing – A case study of aluminium production. Journal of Cleaner Production 321, 128902 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for LCA, ensure that inclusion or exclusion of recycling is consistent with the goal and scope of the study. When modelling the use phase behavior, particular attention should be paid to the actual end-life recycling rates and processes. The data from the Aluminum Association should be used for secondary production modeling. For accuracy, adjustments should be made to reflect higher salt inputs in the recycling process as indicated by the sources. It is also essential to consider the methodological differences due to the variety of collection, processing, and refining methods in secondary production when comparing with primary aluminum production data.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，请确保回收的包含或排除与研究的目标和范围保持一致。在模拟使用阶段行为时，应特别注意实际的终生回收率和过程。铝业协会的数据应用于二次生产建模。为了准确性，根据来源指示，应调整反映回收过程中更高盐输入的数据。在与原生铝生产数据比较时，还必须考虑由于二级生产中的各种收集、处理和精炼方法不同而产生的方法论差异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Unprocessed aluminum scrap [kg] ; 80% from CN and 20% from USA
Quicklime ; EU-28 used as no specific data for CN and NO available

heat, district or industrial, natural gas
